messages.message: I know we’re terminally short on engineering time, but it might be worth taking a couple/few days (a week?) to “finish” the migration from python2 => python3, and cleanup/upgrade 3rd party dependencies. Those two things alone would greatly improve the setup experience for new devs (says someone who just went through that process…)

PY3 migration has some more work to do than a couple days unfortunately

If you or @will want to help with a piece of that project though that’d be fantastic!

We really need help with making a PY3 compatible Dockerfile. You can see that we are missing that for nearly all the images: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bKdDZPELc8noNMk1O578ZPrPIKzDj1OPPTqDHTybtDQ/edit#gid=0

@sudeep is the master of doing that and I will depend on him for helping with the technical details of making sure we do that
I would love to help with that. *adds it to my suddenly increasing todo file*
